languages.text: {n}Около растерзанного трупа друкари лежит окровавленный Глейто. Грудная клетка кибермастифа чуть двигается — он жив, но выведен из строя.{/n}
{n}A bloodied Glaito lies next to the ravaged Drukhari corpse. You detect the slightest movement of the cyber-mastiff's chest — he is alive but he has been rendered inoperable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Около растерзанного трупа друкари лежит окровавленный Глейто. Грудная клетка кибермастифа чуть двигается — он жив, но выведен из строя.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A bloodied Glaito lies next to the ravaged Drukhari corpse. You detect the slightest movement of the cyber-mastiff's chest — he is alive but he has been rendered inoperable.{/n}
{n}A bloodied Glaito lies next to the ravaged Drukhari corpse. You detect the slightest movement of the cyber-mastiff's chest — he is alive but he has been rendered inoperable.{/n}
{n}A bloodied Glaito lies next to the ravaged Drukhari corpse. You detect the slightest movement of the cyber-mastiff's chest — he is alive but he has been rendered inoperable.{/n}
{n}A bloodied Glaito lies next to the ravaged Drukhari corpse. You detect the slightest movement of the cyber-mastiff's chest — he is alive but he has been rendered inoperable.{/n}
{n}A bloodied Glaito lies next to the ravaged Drukhari corpse. You detect the slightest movement of the cyber-mastiff's chest — he is alive but he has been rendered inoperable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}血まみれのグライトが、引き裂かれたデュカーリの死体の横に倒れている。サイバーマスチフの胸にわずかな動きが見られる。彼は生きているが、動作不能にされている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bloodied Glaito lies next to the ravaged Drukhari corpse. You detect the slightest movement of the cyber-mastiff's chest — he is alive but he has been rendered inoperable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}血まみれのグライトが、引き裂かれたデュカーリの死体の横に倒れている。サイバーマスチフの胸にわずかな動きが見られる。彼は生きているが、動作不能にされている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito liegt blutverschmiert neben der übel zugerichteten Drukhari-Leiche. Die Brust des Cyber-Mastiff bewegt sich minimal – er lebt, ist aber außer Betrieb.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bloodied Glaito lies next to the ravaged Drukhari corpse. You detect the slightest movement of the cyber-mastiff's chest — he is alive but he has been rendered inoperable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito liegt blutverschmiert neben der übel zugerichteten Drukhari-Leiche. Die Brust des Cyber-Mastiff bewegt sich minimal – er lebt, ist aber außer Betrieb.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito, couvert de sang, est étendu près du cadavre en charpie du Drukhari. Vous décelez un infime mouvement au niveau du poitrail du cyber-mastiff. Il est en vie, mais lourdement endommagé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bloodied Glaito lies next to the ravaged Drukhari corpse. You detect the slightest movement of the cyber-mastiff's chest — he is alive but he has been rendered inoperable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito, couvert de sang, est étendu près du cadavre en charpie du Drukhari. Vous décelez un infime mouvement au niveau du poitrail du cyber-mastiff. Il est en vie, mais lourdement endommagé.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cuerpo ensangrentado de Glaito yace junto al cadáver destrozado del Drukhari. Detectas un leve movimiento en el tórax del cibermastín; aún vive, pero está incapacitado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bloodied Glaito lies next to the ravaged Drukhari corpse. You detect the slightest movement of the cyber-mastiff's chest — he is alive but he has been rendered inoperable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cuerpo ensangrentado de Glaito yace junto al cadáver destrozado del Drukhari. Detectas un leve movimiento en el tórax del cibermastín; aún vive, pero está incapacitado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}格雷托浑身鲜血淋漓，躺在一具严重损毁的黑暗灵族尸体旁边。你注意到，格雷托的胸口还在轻微地起伏着。它依然活着，但对周围的一切没有任何反应。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bloodied Glaito lies next to the ravaged Drukhari corpse. You detect the slightest movement of the cyber-mastiff's chest — he is alive but he has been rendered inoperable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}格雷托浑身鲜血淋漓，躺在一具严重损毁的黑暗灵族尸体旁边。你注意到，格雷托的胸口还在轻微地起伏着。它依然活着，但对周围的一切没有任何反应。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Harap olmuş Drukhari cesedinin yanı başındaki Glaito, kanlar içinde yatıyor. Siber mastifinin göğsünün ufak ufak hareket ettiğini fark ediyorsun. Hâlâ hayatta ama artık çalışamaz hâle getirilmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bloodied Glaito lies next to the ravaged Drukhari corpse. You detect the slightest movement of the cyber-mastiff's chest — he is alive but he has been rendered inoperable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Harap olmuş Drukhari cesedinin yanı başında Glaito kanlar içinde yatmaktadır. Siber mastifinin göğsünün ufak ufak hareket ettiğini fark ediyorsun. Hâlâ hayatta ama artık çalışamaz hâle getirilmiş.{/n}
